# New Project Setup Template

 - [ ] Issue title is "Project Archive - Project Code" (e.g. `Project Archive - 0273ABC03`)

## Summary Information

**Client Name:** `ABC Health System`

**Client Code:** `0273ABC`

**Project Description:** `Care Coordinator Report and Cost Model Dashboard for ABC MSSP Population`

## Perform the following archive tasks

 - [ ] Delete any `xx-` prefixed folders
 - [ ] Delete any undelivered projects
 - [ ] Ensure unecessary data is deleted from projects (on standard deliverables, ensure disk cleanup has been run on each project)
 - [ ] Use the [archive tool](http://indy-jenkins.milliman.com/job/PRM_Project_Archive/build?delay=0sec) to archive the project in the following drives:
  - [ ] K drive
  - [ ] S drive
 - [ ] Notify someone to review that the preceeding steps were completed correctly prior to closing this issue
